Text: Why is the file so friggen' massive? I'm just wondering. Thanks btw for uploading the episode :D

Thanks EZTZ!

This file is so big because it is 720p HDTV! EZTV usually uploads a 720p and one that is just HDTV! The HDTV should be around 500MB! I will wait for the 500MB!

eztv actually always comes with the HDTV-only firsts, it actually takes awhile to come out with the 720. I was trying to download another 720-Dimension but it was taking forever, think it'll be better to start with this from the start.
Guys..it's "massive" 1.74gb's size is because the title says 720p HDTV. EZTV always releases a SD file around 549mb's, then an HD file (this one)
Thanks. This size is no problem nowadays. C'mon guys. What are you on dial up? :) More seeders = 10min DL =)
As always, thanks eztv. The world is a better place with you in it.
If you have the choice, only download from eztv! 100% legit. always.
